## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r}
data <- read.csv('activity.csv')
data_step <- data[,1]
datastep_no_missing <- data_step[!is.na(data_step)==TRUE]
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

```{r,echo = TRUE}
Mean_Steps <- mean(datastep_no_missing,na.rm= TRUE)
Mean_Steps
Median_Steps <- median(datastep_no_missing,na.rm= TRUE)
Median_Steps

hist(data_step)
```
